full_description:
Anker Soundcore R50i True Wireless Earbuds

The Anker Soundcore R50i True Wireless Earbuds feature big 10mm drivers that deliver powerful sound with deep bass. With 22 preset EQ options available in the Soundcore app, you can customize your listening experience to suit your preferences. These Anker Soundcore R50i True Wireless Earbuds are designed to be ergonomic and lightweight, ensuring a comfortable fit even during long listening sessions. They come with a compact case that can be conveniently stored and carried using the included lanyard. Enjoy all-day playtime with up to 10 hours of continuous playback on a single charge, and an additional 30 hours of power provided by the charging case. The AI-clear calls feature, powered by dual microphones and AI processing, ensures crystal-clear voice transmission during phone calls. Thanks to fast charging technology, just a 10-minute charge gives you an extra 2 hours of playtime. The Anker Soundcore R50i True Wireless Earbuds are also IPX5 water-resistant, making them splash-proof and suitable for outdoor use. Instant pairing allows for quick and hassle-free connection to your devices, while the single earbud mode lets you listen to audio with one ear while keeping the other ear open to hear your surroundings.

full_description:
Anker Soundcore Liberty 4 Active Noise-Cancelling True Wireless Earbuds

The Anker Soundcore Liberty 4 True Wireless Earbuds feature Soundcore's exclusive coaxial acoustic system with ACAA 3.0 for crisp and clear premium sound. The dual dynamic drivers deliver vivid notes, while the coaxial structure provides balanced sound with a wide frequency range. Enjoy high frequencies with minimal loss through the treble tube and extended Hi-Res sound with the resonance peak. Immerse yourself in a 360° spatial audio experience with dynamic head tracking that surrounds you with sound. The CloudComfort ear tips ensure cloud-like comfort even during extended listening sessions. Track your heart rate during activities with the in-ear heart rate sensor and visualize the data in the soundcore app. Customize your sound with HearID Sound 2.0 and enjoy over 20 default EQ settings. The earbuds feature adaptive noise cancelling, exceptional call clarity with 6 mics, and transparency mode. With up to 28 hours of playtime, multipoint connection, squeeze control, and the Soundcore app for customization, these earbuds are designed with convenience in mind.

title: Anker Soundcore Liberty 3 Pro True Wireless Active Noise-Cancelling Earbuds
cat_seo_title: Anker Earbuds Price in Bangladesh | Star Tech
cat_seo_description: Buy Anker Earbuds at the best price in Bangladesh. Latest Anker TWS True Wireless Stereo Earbuds available at Star Tech Shop. Order online to get delivery anywhere in BD.
cat_seo_keywords: Anker TWS True Wireless Stereo Earbuds
full_description:
Anker Soundcore Liberty 3 Pro True Wireless Active Noise-Cancelling Earbuds

The Anker Soundcore Liberty 3 Pro Earbuds is the most popular earbuds of soundcore earbuds history. It is recommended by 20 GRAMMY Winning Producers. Liberty 3 Pro's revolutionary sound is getting big praise from media, YouTubers, and customers alike. It has lot of exclusive features for earbuds lovers.

Premium Sound

ACAA 2.0 is the latest version of our groundbreaking coaxial driver technology. With its upgraded structure and materials, pure sound is delivered directly to your ears. Bass is strong, mids are enhanced by 150%, and treble is increased by 460% for an ultra-wide and immersive soundstage.

Hi-Res Listening Experience

Listen to your favorite tunes in Hi-Res Audio Wireless quality sound. Liberty 3 Pro noise cancelling earbuds support LDAC mode, a Bluetooth codec which transfers 3x more data to preserve details and sound quality.

Personalized HearID Sound

Liberty 3 Pro offers you unprecedented levels of customization. HearID ANC analyzes in-ear pressure and the way noise moves in your ears to create a personalized noise cancelling profile. HearID Sound intelligently tests your hearing and creates a tailor-made sound profile that's unique to your ears.

Multipoint Connection

Connect Liberty 3 Pro to two Bluetooth devices at the same time to easily switch between music, videos, calls, and more. To activate, use the earbuds' touch controls or use the Device List in the soundcore app to manage.

Turn On Transparency & Exceptional Clarity

Stay connected to the world by activating transparency mode when you want to speak to someone or need a heightened awareness of your surroundings. 6 microphones and an AI-noise reduction algorithm filter out background noises and enhance your voice in real-time so you can be heard clearly.

Fusion Comfort & soundcore App

Enjoy up to 8 hours of music from a single charge of the wireless earbuds and extend the playtime to 32 hours with the charging case. If the case itself needs recharging, simply place it down on a wireless charger or use the included USB-C cable. Use the soundcore app to choose from a wide selection of EQ modes, activate 3D Surround Sound for immersive listening, customize the touch controls, and more.

The Anker Soundcore Liberty 3 Pro Earbuds comes with 18 Months Warranty.

values.value: Upto 8-hour battery in earbuds with ANC off

The Anker Soundcore R100 True Wireless Earbuds are a pair of truly wireless earbuds. The R100 TWS earbuds include several amazing features, including quick auto-pairing with a suitable input source, IPX5 water, and sweat resistance, Bluetooth 5.0 connection, and a 500mAh battery that lasts six hours on a full charge and up to 25 hours when the charging case is attached. The Soundcore R100 TWS earbuds also have hall-sensor technology, which allows for a quick connection after opening the device case. The device's 10mm Graphene dynamic drivers work in tandem with other technologies to provide an immersive listening experience. The Soundcore R100 TWS earbuds were designed by Anker for the clearest music experience paired with cutting-edge technology. full_description:
Anker Soundcore Sport X10 ANC True Wireless Sport Earbuds

The Anker Soundcore Sport X10 ANC True Wireless Sport Earbuds are earbuds designed to provide high-quality sound and comfort for your active lifestyle. With AAC and SBC Bluetooth codecs, they have 10mm dynamic speakers that deliver rich and detailed sound. They also include a dynamic acoustic system that is tailored to generate music with double the bass, providing you with a strong and immersive listening experience. Bluetooth 5.2 technology is used in the earbuds, ensuring a quick and robust connection with your devices. They also contain six microphones and noise cancellation technology, which decrease ambient noise and improve call quality. The earbuds have a one-of-a-kind ear hook design that can spin up to 210°, allowing you to customize the fit and comfort to your ear shape and size. The ear hooks also give a solid and powerful hold, preventing the earbuds from sliding off during exercise. The Anker Soundcore Sport X10 ANC True Wireless Sport Earbuds are simple to use, with touch-sensitive controls for playing, pausing, skipping music, adjusting volume, activating voice assistance, and switching between noise suppression modes. The earbuds also have an IPX7 rating, indicating that they are waterproof and sweatproof, making them appropriate for any weather or activity. The battery life of the earphones is up to 8 hours per charge and up to 32 hours with the charging case. The Anker Soundcore Sport X10 ANC True Wireless Sport Earbuds also feature quick charging, which provides an additional hour of entertainment in only 10 minutes.

Anker Soundcore P20i True Wireless Earbuds

The Anker Soundcore P20i True Wireless Earbuds are designed to provide an immersive listening experience unlike any other. With 10mm drivers, these earbuds deliver more bass for a completely immersive listening experience. Dual microphones of P20i earbuds enable AI-enhanced conversations, resulting in crystal-clear communication even in busy surroundings. With up to 30 hours of playtime and rapid charging, you may listen to music without interruption for lengthy periods of time. The IPX5 water-resistant rating of P20i gives piece of mind, enabling you to listen to your favorite music while working out or in light rain. The lightweight and tight construction provides a secure and comfortable fit, ideal for all-day usage. With multiple EQ modes, including pounding bass and podcasting mode for balanced audio, you may tailor your listening experience to your tastes. AI technology minimizes background noise during conversations, resulting in clear, distortion-free communication. Bluetooth 5.2 technology offers a strong connection between your smartphone and the earphones, resulting in flawless sound transfer. Furthermore, the earbuds include mono mode, which activates when one earbud is placed in the charging case, allowing you to use the other earbud for continuous listening. The Anker Soundcore P20i True Wireless Earbuds provide great music quality, comfort, and convenience wherever you go.

Long Playtime, Fast Charging

With a case that increases battery life to 30 hours, you may get 10 hours of use from a single charge. The P20i true wireless earbuds are low on battery; a simple 10-minute charge provides 2 hours of gameplay.

AI-Enhanced Clear Calls

Two built-in microphones and an AI system of Soundcore P20i combine to collect information Your voice so you never have to yell on the phone.

IPX5 Water Resistant

The Anker Soundcore P20i earbud has IPX5 water resistance which can save the buds from the water and sweat splash easily.

full_description:
Anker Soundcore Liberty Air 2 Pro ANC True Wireless Earbuds

The Anker Soundcore Liberty Air 2 Pro True Wireless Earbuds deliver Pure Sound thanks to Targeted Active Noise Cancellation. Choose your setting in the Soundcore app and listen as ambient noises fade away, leaving just pure sound. PureNote Driver Technology is used in this TWS. Get a 45 percent increase in bass and a 30 percent broader frequency spectrum than standard drivers. Drivers with ten hardened nano-layers provide remarkable rigidity, resulting in astounding precision and clarity. HearID Personalized EQ is available on the Anker Soundcore Liberty Air 2 Pro. HearID automatically analyzes your unique hearing profile and generates a tailor-made sound set up exclusively for your ears to ensure a great listening experience. Alternatively, you may take total control of the sound with the customizable EQ or the 22 preset sound profiles. These earphones Playtime for up to 26 hours With up to three recharges from the charging case, you can get 7 hours of playing from a single charge on the earbuds. It contains six noise-canceling microphones with noise reduction to ensure that your speech is isolated and transmitted clearly for a face-to-face encounter. It has no warranty.

values.value: Total Playtime with Charging Case: 26 Hours
